synopsis.text: Medousa Virus, a lethal pandemic, is turning humans into stone, causing global panic and despair. As a last resort, a group of 160 infected individuals, including Kasumi, are cryogenically frozen to await a cure. When Kasumi awakens, she finds herself in a terrifying world where the facility is overgrown with menacing thorns and infested with ferocious monsters. Separated from her twin sister, Shizuku, Kasumi and six others must navigate this treacherous labyrinth and fight for survival. As they struggle to unravel the truth behind their nightmarish reality, they can't help but wonder how much time they have left before the virus claims their lives. Directed by Kazuyoshi Katayama, this violent survival film blurs the line between dreams and reality, leaving Kasumi and her fellow survivors to confront the horrifying consequences of their only hope for salvation.
